# grove clone: error when duplicate branches specified

mkdir testrepo
exec git init testrepo
cd testrepo
exec git config user.name "Test"
exec git config user.email "test@example.com"
exec git config commit.gpgsign false
cp ../README.md .
exec git add .
exec git commit -m 'initial commit'
cd ..

mkdir clone-duplicate-branches
! exec grove clone file://$WORK/testrepo clone-duplicate-branches --branches 'main,main'
stderr 'âœ— failed to create worktree for branch'
stderr 'already exists'

-- README.md --
# Test Repository
This is a test repository for grove.
